#### Developer Checklist:
<!--  Before requesting for code review, please ensure that the following tasks are completed. -->

- [ ] Read your code changes at least once
- [ ] Tested on multiple web browsers
- [ ] Tested responsiveness (e.g, iPhone, iPad, Desktop)
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Unit tests*
- [ ] Added e2e tests*

_* If applicable_
